A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you enjoy the heart and soul of Star Wars\, prepare to have that ripped from your chest by the tried and true Marvel-esque formula being applied to the universe we knew. This takes every character development arc and crushes it for the sake of a cheap thrill. Rian Johnson takes risks where they make little sense\, fails to continue any semblance of a story\, and bends the universe until it snaps in half. This wasn't a Star Wars movie\, it wasn't even a good movie. I feel like as a life-long fan I was politely shown the door\, as I am no longer the target demographic.
